name: The Bagel Arcade
description:
"The Bagel Arcade" is  a  the game made for the Git Together 0 jam.

You got a 100 coins, a toilet and a lot of arcade games to start with. You'd need to spend some coins to play and game. And obviously, you will earn rewards for winning each one!

Controls

Move - WASD / Arrow keys

Interact - Space / Enter

Esc - End a game

* Has Gamepad support
